title: Riot please respond, Lag on OCE servers, is it me or the servers?
body:
So lately i have been lagging absolutely through the roof, my MS/Ping is reaching up to 4000, it happened to me last game and it went from the casual 90 to straight up 3000, it happened to 4 other members in the game and i just wanted to know if it was a coincidence or what? 

Be great if Riot could respond :D

replies.body:
Hey Treyden,

You can check where your lag starts (whether it's at you or your ISP or at Riot's server) by running a traceroute. Head here to learn how to run it; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

If you are having connection issues not related to Riot, perform the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

-DTN
